content: k3 sm p1 k to marker sm p1 k2 p4 k2 twice p1 k2 yo p2tog k3 p2 k3 p4 k1 twice k2 p2 k3 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 127 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p3 2/1 lpc 2/2 rpc 2/2 lpc twice 2/1 rpc p3 yo p2tog p2 s1 p2 k4 p2 twice s1 p1 sm k to next marker m1l sm k3 row 128 k3 sm p1 k to marker sm p1 k2 p4 k2 twice p1 k2 yo p2tog k4 p4 k4 3 times yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 repeat row 113 to 128 as established until there are 160 sts on the needle then begin the top garter stitch border
